# Welcome

**Welcome to the companion text for DS 5100 Programming for Data Science.**

This text is designed to provide all the content necessary to take DS 5100 at UVA's [School of Data Science](https://datascience.virginia.edu/). The course provides an introduction to programming from a data science perspective. It focuses on the development of basic skills in Python and R Programming, as well the command line and GitHub. It is currently one of two foundational courses taught, along with a course in linear models.
